body: I'm trying to code some stuff, like animations and stuff involving HTML Canvas, but I'm kinda stuck on something. Is there anyone good at Javascript and HTML5 that can help me? Please Skype me. Thanks!
body_tagged: I'm trying to code some stuff, like animations and stuff involving HTML Canvas, but I'm kinda stuck on something. Is there anyone good at Javascript and HTML5 that can help me? Please Skype me. Thanks!
title: Coding Help

replies.body: I'm not great at teaching but I would highly suggest to you going to a book store and buying a coding book, that helps a lot
replies.body_tagged: I'm not great at teaching but I would highly suggest to you going to a book store and buying a coding book, that helps a lot

replies.body: No, I have like 3 years of experience in coding HTML and Javascript, but its just that I have a problem with something and if someone could help code it with me, that'd be great
